title: DirectX Failure into not being able to patch
body: Played a whole bunch of ranked games today with no trouble and then queued for another game, went through champ select and then couldn't play my game because of a "DirectX bug" This has been reported by many users and I went to multiple youtube videos to figure it out and nothing works. Now when I try to play it says that it can't patch and asks me to restart. Help? I just lost my team a game I think because I can't get into a game because of these bugs.

replies.body:
Refer to tasks #3 & 4 in the [Bug & Crash Exterminator.](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201761974-Bug-Splat-and-Game-Crashes) Kha’Zix and Elise won’t know what hit ‘em.

If you experience issues after performing these steps, please let us know. 

http://na.leagueoflegends.com/sites/default/files/styles/scale_xlarge/public/upload/khazix_deathblossom_splash_1920x1080.jpg?itok=re5tY9ln https://static.lolwallpapers.net/2014/12/Death-Blossom-Elise.jpg
Nothing on there worked, I ended up having to uninstall and reinstall. I haven't gone into game yet to see if it works. I will post again if I run into another issue.

After all these bugs and after installing the client, I had to delete the leagueclient.exe (Beta Client) in the league of legends directory and then upgrade the client in order for the new client to actually patch into the old client.
